attributes.action: The HM Government e-petition website must petition parliament as well as government
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned request that the e-petiton website be opened to petition parliament, as well as govenment.

Once an e-petition reaches a trigger point it would need to  be discussed in parliament - therefore on the basis that the contents of an e-petition from this site would have to eventually be discussed in parliament then it should be open to parliament petitions and not just govenment.
